name: Breadboard
description:
Currently only works with mouse and keyboard.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Look Around: Mouse
  • Pause: P
  • Close Pause Menu: ESC
  • Quit Game: Alt + F4
  • Drop Tool: Q
  • While Holding Wire Gun
    • Click to place wire node or select node
    • Alt + Click on wire node to delete
    • Ctrl + Click to place wire node that isn't attached to previous nod
